text.section: The Department of Education and the Maryland School for the Deaf shall enter into a written agreement.

section.section: The Maryland School for the Deaf may enter into written agreements with State and local agencies, including local school systems, for the purpose of providing services to deaf children.
This subsection in no way abrogates the obligation of the local school systems to provide alternative programs for deaf and hard of hearing students.
